body_html:
@asimshankar Thanks for your time and response

I tried to execute the command as suggested

bazel build -c opt --config=monolithic //tensorflow:libtensorflow_cc.so --crosstool_top=//external:android/crosstool --host_crosstool_top=@bazel_tools//tools/cpp:toolchain --cpu=arm64-v8a

But unfortunately I receive same set of errors with an additional warning

> WARNING: Config values are not defined in any .rc file: monolithic

Could I please know if i need to add any set of lines in
/tensorflow/tools/bazel.rc to resolve the warning OR Can I please know if there is any other way to resolve it
Thanks
body_text:
@asimshankar  Thanks for your time and response
I tried to execute the command as suggested
bazel build -c opt --config=monolithic //tensorflow:libtensorflow_cc.so    --crosstool_top=//external:android/crosstool    --host_crosstool_top=@bazel_tools//tools/cpp:toolchain --cpu=arm64-v8a
But unfortunately I receive same set of errors with an additional warning
> WARNING: Config values are not defined in any .rc file: monolithic
Could I please know if i need to add any set of lines in
 /tensorflow/tools/bazel.rc to resolve the warning OR Can I please know if there is any other way to resolve it
Thanks
body:
@asimshankar  Thanks for your time and response

I tried to execute the command as suggested


`bazel build -c opt --config=monolithic //tensorflow:libtensorflow_cc.so    --crosstool_top=//external:android/crosstool    --host_crosstool_top=@bazel_tools//tools/cpp:toolchain --cpu=arm64-v8a`

But unfortunately I receive same set of errors with an additional warning

`> WARNING: Config values are not defined in any .rc file: monolithic`

Could I please know if i need to add any set of lines in 
` /tensorflow/tools/bazel.rc` to resolve the warning OR Can I please know if there is any other way to resolve it
Thanks
